item.title: This ‘violently racist’ hacker claims to be the source of The New York Times’ Mamdani scoop
item.description: The ultimate source for The New York Times’ story about Zohran Mamdani’s college application is an open secret. It’s an anime-loving neo-Nazi whose hobbies include furry drawings, posting fan art of a
